meanings.definition: A type of Hungarian stew or soup, usually made with meat and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: My grandma makes delicious goulashes for dinner every Sunday.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant down the street serves traditional goulashes that are very popular.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled goulashes on my shirt while trying to eat quickly.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the simmering goulashes filled the kitchen with warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The goulashes bubbling in the pot looked like a colorful masterpiece of flavors.

meanings.definition: A type of shoe with a thick rubber sole and a fabric upper, often worn in wet or muddy conditions.
meanings.sent1: After the rain, I put on my goulashes to walk through the muddy fields.
meanings.sent2: The kids wore their goulashes to play outside after the storm.
meanings.sent3: I slipped on my goulashes and pretended to be a superhero in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her bright red goulashes stood out against the dull pavement on the rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The goulashes protected my feet from getting wet and muddy during the hike.
